      • init

              throws ResourceInstantiationException
        Description copied from class: AbstractResource

        Throws:
        ResourceInstantiationException

      • getActions

        public List<Action> getActions(NameBearerHandle handle)
        Get the right-click menu items that this tool will add to the specified resource. Note that this implementation uses a cache so that the same items will be returned each time the menu is displayed. For a fully dynamic approach a subclass should override this method to simply call @{link buildActions(NameBearerHandle).
        Parameters:
        handle - the NameBearerHandle instance we are wanting to add new menu items to
        Returns:
        a list of Action instances which will be added to the right click menu of the specified handle

      • buildActions

        protected abstract List<Action> buildActions(NameBearerHandle handle)
        Build the Action instances that should be used to enhance the right-click menu of the specified NameBearerHandle.
        Parameters:
        handle - the NameBearerHandle instance we are adding to
        Returns:
        a list of Action instances that will be added to the right-click menu of the resource.

      • call

        public Object call(String action,
          Resource resource,
          Object... params)
            throws NoSuchMethodException,
                   IllegalArgumentException,
                   IllegalAccessException,
                   InvocationTargetException
        Allows for the calling of methods defined within ResourceHelper instances which aren't part of the core API and so which can only be called via reflection.
        Parameters:
        action - the name of the method to call (method must take a Resource instance as it's first parameter)
        resource - the Resource instance that you want to help
        params - parameters to the method you are trying to call
        Returns:
        the return value from the method you are calling, or null if the method has a void return type
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException
        IllegalArgumentException
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
